trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sheffield
There were no other sightings in Sheffield on or around February 13th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed a single object relatively low in the night sky when approaching home by car. Turned into the drive. Got out of car continued to observe the object (orange ball glowing star-like, wholly unlike a fixed or rotary winged aircraft). This was also viewed by three other family members. Managed to observe through 8 x 40 binoculars, however unable to discern additional detail. The object moved silently and relatively slowly on a slightly curved course travelling roughly East South East veering South and seemed to gain altitude and fade out of sight, pulsating slightly as it did so. I have seen two of these objects before (late December 2008 and early January 2009), which I reported to MUFON in early January 2009. I experienced no impact on feelings during the sighting, remaining calm and rational.
Summary: Orange coloured glowing ball moving slowly across the night sky in a roughly south south westerly direction.
